ProductInfo.Features:
8 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial stand alone DVR with 2000GB, 3.5" SATA hard drive. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Support Live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOON function. CIF: 200fps/8ch
Dome Camera: 1/3'' Color CCD; Horizontal Resolution: 480 TV Lines; Lens: 3.6mm; 20 Infrared LEDs
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 CH Home CCTV Surveillance DVR System H.264 Audio Video CCTV Network Digital Video Recorder Recording with 8 of Day Night Outdoor Security Cameras, Power Supplies and Extension Cables CPG
